channel.title: Posts on Nahuh's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Nahuh's Blog

item.title: Hugo 搭建
item.description: test 修改post meta themes文件夹下面的layouts/partials找到post_meta.html {{ $date := .Date.Format "02.01.2006" }} {{ $lastmod := .Lastmod.Format "02.01.2006" }} {{- if ne $lastmod $date -}} {{- $scratch.Add "meta" (slice (printf "<span title='%s'>(updated %s)</span>" (.Lastmod) (.Lastmod | time.Format (default "January 2, 2006" site.Params.DateFormat)))) }} {{- end }} page bundle 用于单page的资源管理，属于该页的资源都放在这个文件夹 branch bundle 适用于页面下有嵌套子页 https://blog.darkthread.net/blog/hugo-figures/
